boxes.text: I found you unconcious on the plains.

I am Lyn, of the Lorca tribe.
You're safe now.

Who are you?
Can you remember your name?

Your name is asdf?
What an odd sounding name...

But pay me no mind.
It is a good name.
I see by your attire that you are a traveler.
What brings you to the Sacae Plains? Would you share your story with me?
I'll go see what's happening. asdf, wait here for me.
Oh, no! Bandits! They must have come down from the Bern Mountains! They must be planning on raiding the local villages. I... I have to stop them!
If that's all of them, I think I can handle them on my own. You'll be safe in here, Mark.
What? You want to help? Well, can you use a weapon?
Ah, I see... So you're a strategist by tade? An odd profession, but...
